name: Dodo (itch)
description:
Our entry for Ludum Dare 46 - Keep it alive

Rubber Duck Coder - Programming

LemonShrimp & theforceluke - Art

Press Dodo! to play

Place signs with Left Mouse to shoo the Dodos away.
3 signs max on screen.

Reach the nest to save the Dodos.
Collect eggs to get even more Dodos.

Avoid dangerous things!
